short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple clipper for the obsidian

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Link your Github repo and send notes to it directly from this extension. An easy way to maintain and version your quick notes and thoughts that you come up with while surfing the internet.
